Name: Zombie Killer Drift - Racing Survival
About the game: Welcome in the fantastic open world of Zombie Killer Drift - Racing Survival. The zombie tsunami is already here! Zombies roam the country and there is almost no escape. As you progress through the game you will unlock new vehicles, upgrading them into the ultimate zombie-smashing machines! You are the last survivor, this is why, only you can save humanity! It will be a hard fight, but you don't have to give up and continue until the end. Game Features: - 15 vehicles, including off road cars, sports car and more. Be sure to upgrade them each time you buy a new car - 16 levels available - Big Open World map - Customization of each car
